channel.title: Need Help with Zenith error with client
channel.description: Hi there i keep geting this error and dnot know how to fix it i redownload all of the java programs and stuff im using jre7 and stuff but still not working every time i run the client it Says Loading - please wait. Checking for updates - 1% can anybody help me with this if you want to team viewer me thats cool as well plz help?

item.title: Need Help with Zenith error with client
item.dc:creator: @ByteSized ByteSized
item.description:
@ByteSized wrote:

Your client is not hooked up to your server. You need to change the IP of the client to the IP of the server so it matches.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Zenith error with client
